page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content:
Forden is'nt a very big place but there are a lot of things in it like the school which is small with about sixty children. Also by the school there is a community centre where we have our gym. There are three pubs, The Railway Inn,The Cock Hotel and The Compass. There is a shop which sells rustic garden furniture which Mr Bright makes himself.
Much of Forden is farm land. There is also Brynhyfryd Hospital for mentaly ill people. The river Severn runs straight through Forden. The church in Forden is called St Michaels and was rebuilt in Victorian times. There is also St Michaels Crescent where there are a lot of houses.
